name: WP-SOS-Donate Donation Sidebar Plugin
author: David Krcek

sections.description:
With WP-SOS-Donate you can simply add a sidebar widget for help donation e.g for haiti.
After the plugin is activated, you can drag and drop WP-SOS-Donate Widget to your Sidebar.
You can choose your own headline, the color of the subline, the charity link and the picture in the widget.
If this is not enough for your site, you can define your own template.
sections.installation:
1. Upload and unzip wp-sos-donate.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation you can drag and drop the widget on your sidebar.
  4. Customize the sidebar widget output in settings
sections.changelog:
0.9.2

  • Delete adding semmelstatz option to settings menue

0.9.1

  • Some fixes with the donate image

0.9.0

  • Initial version.
